title: Help with this font
content:
Please can anyone help with the font for the Claire House ?

Thanks so much

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419155443im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Claire_4230.jpg)
author: Style Embroidery

comments.content:
Hello,  
be kind and someone please help me  
with the name of the font used for the  
"Public School"  
scirpt in the attached picture.

Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419155443im_/http:/typophile.com/files/public%20school_4226.jpg)

Thank you,  
I am a newbie here.  
Sorry.
Not a problem Chris, I take it you couldn't help with my font query ?
difficult to say, as there are so many handwritten fonts out there. It may of even been created manually with a good ol' wacom tablet,
the e's on your sample are slightly different, but it looks like maybe they were tracing/copying [Akbar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419155443/http:/www.ffonts.net/Akbar.font)
For the second e they have probably used the [Paulson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419155443/http:/www.dafont.com/paulson.font?psize=l&text=e) - and modified it a bit to make it suit the Akbar.
